Client

Class ClientSynchronizer

    • Client.ClientSynchronizer

  • class ClientSynchronizer

    1.0
    Author:
    Szymon Kuzik

    • Method Detail

      • synchronizer

        void synchronizer()
        This function with ServerSynchronizer keeps both local and server folders up to date to each other. Data is exchanged in such order: - Server sends list of available users - Client sends list of their files - Server sends list of files missing on server - Client sends one file missing on server or sends file to another user - Server saves file to proper user folders - Server sends one file missing on client
